summary: A commandâ€‘line utility that automates the acquisition of Kerberos service tickets using S4U2Self and S4U2Proxy (delegation) techniques, handling ticket requests, optional proxying, and storing the resulting tickets in a credential cache.
business_intent: Empower security professionals to request Kerberos service tickets on behalf of users without needing their passwords, enabling testing of delegation configurations, lateral movement, and privilege escalation scenarios in Active Directory environments.
